medium: Cotton, silk; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning, embroidery
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: Three panel huipil, four selvage; white ground with colored stripes at lengthwise selvages; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning at shoulders and top half of central panel; embroidered neckline, large purple band with yellow, green, blue center circle or line; design consists of narrow rows of multi-colored geometric figures.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
